name: Ludum Dare 48 - Don't Fall Asleep
description:
Stay awake and get milk from the basement while avoiding the sleep monsters

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/dont-fall-asleep

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Interact (doors, fridge, milk) - E
